FT_CLIENT_SECRET=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

# App configuration
NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL=http://localhost:3000

# vercel

# typescript
*.tsbuildinfo
next-env.d.ts

import Link from 'next/link'; import WidgetGenerator from '@/components/forms/WidgetGenerator'; export const metadata = { title: '42 Skills Widget Generator | 42widgets', description: 'Generate beautiful widgets to showcase your 42 school programming skills on GitHub or any website.', }; export default function SkillsWidgetPage() { return (

42 Skills Widget Generator

Showcase your 42 school programming skills with beautiful widgets for your GitHub profile or portfolio

{/* Tabs for different widget types */}
Skills Bars Skills Radar Skills Badge
{/* Examples section */}

Examples

Skills Bars (Dark Theme)

Skills Radar (GitHub Theme)

{/* Widget generator form */}
{/* How to use section */}

How to Use

  1. Enter your 42 intra username
  2. Choose a theme that matches your GitHub profile or website
  3. Generate your widget
  4. Copy the markdown code
  5. Paste it into your GitHub README.md file or any markdown file

GitHub README Example

            {`
# Hi there 👋

I'm a 42 school student passionate about coding!

## My 42 Skills

![42 Skills Bars](https://42widgets.io/api/widget/skills-bars/zelhajou?theme=github)
            `.trim()}
); }

import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; const Footer = () => { return (
{/* Site Info */}

42widgets

Beautiful widgets for 42 School students to showcase their skills, projects, and achievements on GitHub and other platforms.

{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Links

  • Home
  • Skills Widgets
  • Projects Widgets
  • Stats Widgets
  • Coalition Widgets
{/* About */}

About

  • About 42widgets
  • GitHub Repository
  • About 42 School
{/* Copyright */}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} 42widgets. Made with ❤️ by 42 students for 42 students.

This website is not officially affiliated with 42 School. All 42 trademarks belong to their respective owners.

); }; export default Footer;

{
  "name": "42-widgets",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "next dev --turbopack",
    "build": "next build",
    "start": "next start",
    "lint": "next lint"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "axios": "^1.8.4",
    "chart.js": "^4.4.8",
    "jotai": "^2.12.2",
    "lodash": "^4.17.21",
    "next": "15.2.4",
    "react": "^19.0.0",
    "react-chartjs-2": "^5.3.0",
    "react-dom": "^19.0.0",
    "react-svg-to-image": "^3.0.0",
    "swr": "^2.3.3"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@tailwindcss/postcss": "^4",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.16",
    "postcss": "^8.4.31",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.3.5"
  }
}
